segments.text: But the auction is a blast ! And I haven't even told you the best part yet !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't care what the best part is . Whatever you say won't change my mind . I'm not buying anything !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That stamp you've been looking for is for sale .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The 1879 Large Dragon ? Are you serious ? How much ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! I thought you weren't interested ! Sorry , I've gotta go ! I'm going to switch over to eBay and see if my bid is still the highest .
segments.speaker: S1
